title: dog_bedding_retrieval_evening
summary: Evening retrieval of dog bedding that was sun-dried earlier in the day.
description: This data unit documents the retrieval of dog bedding in the evening after being sun-dried earlier in the morning. The bedding was collected and removed from the drying area as part of routine animal care and hygiene maintenance.

reference_context.note: Morning sun-drying activity referenced for continuity of daily routine.

external_reference.note: Image serves as primary evidence of evening retrieval.
